title: Cloud Room
location: HUONE Clarke Quay, 3D River Valley Road, #03-01, Clarke Quay, Singapore 179023
price:
HALF DAY MINIMUM RENTAL $600++
FULL DAY MINIMUM RENTAL $800++
Our pricing model: (Package price X No. of Pax) OR (Minimum Rental) – whichever is higher
description:
Let your thoughts run free like the kites flying above your head and grass beneath your feet. This is an intimate room best suited for meetings. It also comes with an attached private balcony, bringing natural sunlight into the room and your meeting.
The balcony area with a gorgeous view of the Singapore River can take 12 pax standing
facilities: 1 White board with flip chart paper (additional flip chart at $20++)

title: Cottage Room

price:

FULL DAY MINIMUM RENTAL $2000++
Our pricing model: (Package price X No. of Pax) OR (Minimum Rental) – whichever is higher
description:
Get a taste of the Nordic cottage experience by the fireplace in this cosy meeting room. Ideal for training, team meetings and brainstorming sessions. Natural daylight flows into the room from the attached private balcony.
The balcony area with a gorgeous view of the Singapore River can take 12 pax standing
facilities: 2 White boards with flip chart paper (additional flip chart at $20++)

title: Forest Room
